definition: Gospel according to St Mark
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
see 可汗[ke4 han2]
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
good fortune/happiness/luck
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: Remember how the Gospel of Mark ends?
sentences.chinese: 还记得《马可福音》怎么结尾的吗？

sentences.english: Today's lesson is taken from the St Mark's Gospel.
sentences.chinese: 今日的经文选自《马可福音》。

sentences.english: But then you get to the next book in the New Testament, the Gospel of Mark.
sentences.chinese: 然后你读到新约第二篇，马可福音。

sentences.english: When they arrived at Salamis, they proclaimed the word of God in the Jewish synagogues.
sentences.chinese: 马可和他们在一起，当帮手，后编写了马可福音。
